ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Phasianus colchicus (ring necked pheasant) dietary 145 mg/kg/8 day
LC50 Anas platyrhynchos (mallard duck) dietary 185 mg/kg/8 day
LC50 Salmo gairdneri (rainbow trout) 0.01 mg/l/96 hr /Conditions of bioassay not specified/
LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (bluegill sunfish) 0.004 mg/l/96 hr /Conditions of bioassay not specified/
LD50 Apis mellifera (honey bee) topical 0.0041 mg/bee
LC50 Coturnix japonica (Japanese quail) oral 284 ppm, 5 day diet ad libitum (95% confidence interval: 239-342 ppm) /Technical grade, 99% active ingredient in corn oil diluent/
LC50 Coturnix japonica (Japanese quail) oral 225 ppm, 5 day diet ad libitum (95% confidence interval: 194-265 ppm) /Commercial formulation (Counter 15 G), 15% active ingredient in corn oil diluent/

LC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow) 13.3 mg/l/96 hr (confidence limit 11.8-15.1 mg/l), flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 25.0 °C, dissolved oxygen 6.5 mg/l, hardness 49.4 mg/l calcium carbonate, alkalinity 40.8 mg/l calcium carbonate, and pH 7.5.

EC50 Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow) 13.1 mg/l/96 hr (confidence limit 11.5 -14.8 mg/l), flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 25.0 °C, dissolved oxygen 6.5 mg/l, hardness 49.4 mg/l calcium carbonate, alkalinity 40.8 mg/l calcium carbonate, and pH 7.5. Effect: loss of equilibrium.
